name: KlingonWordoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

Developer Terms of Use
des: Add the Klingon Dictionary's Word of the Day, provided by the Klingon Assault Group's Hol 'ampaS (Language Academy), to your flash briefing.
